name: Starter Birb Kit
description: Perfect for beginners! This kit includes everything you need to start capturing amazing bird photos in your backyard. Easy to assemble with our step-by-step guide.
longDescription: The Starter Birb Kit is designed for bird enthusiasts who want to dip their toes into smart bird watching. The kit comes with a Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W, a quality 5MP camera module, and a simple but effective wooden feeder base. The included software captures photos whenever motion is detected, storing them locally for you to browse. Perfect for beginners and makes a great gift!

name: Pro Birb Kit
description: For serious bird watchers! Features a high-resolution camera, weather-resistant enclosure, and WiFi streaming capabilities.
longDescription: Take your bird watching to the next level with the Pro Birb Kit. This premium package includes a Raspberry Pi 4 with 2GB RAM, a stunning 12MP camera module with autofocus, and a weather-resistant enclosure that can withstand rain, snow, and sun. Stream live video to your phone, get instant notifications when birds arrive, and capture crystal-clear photos day or night with the included IR LEDs.

name: Ultimate Birb Kit
description: The complete package! AI-powered bird identification, solar charging, and cloud storage for all your birb photos.
longDescription: The Ultimate Birb Kit is for the dedicated ornithologist who wants the absolute best. This kit features a Raspberry Pi 4 with 4GB RAM running our custom AI software that automatically identifies bird species in real-time. Solar panels keep your feeder running indefinitely, while cloud integration ensures you never lose a precious photo. Includes premium cedar wood construction and a lifetime software license.

name: Camera Upgrade Module
description: Upgrade your existing kit with this 12MP autofocus camera module. Compatible with all Birb Kits.
longDescription: Want better photos from your existing setup? This 12MP camera upgrade module is a drop-in replacement for the cameras in our Starter and Pro kits. Features autofocus for crystal-clear images and improved low-light performance.

name: Solar Power Add-on
description: Go off-grid! Solar panel and battery pack to power your bird feeder anywhere in your yard.
longDescription: Free your bird feeder from power outlets with this solar add-on kit. Includes a high-efficiency solar panel and a rechargeable battery pack that provides up to 3 days of operation without sun. Perfect for remote locations in your yard.
